reviewDetails.comment: Dr Emy is a very good doctor in terms of correct diagnoses and bedside manners. I had to come back to him after the pandemic even though I have to travel for two hours because he made me feel comfortable and I trust him to help me reach my optimal health.
Very thoughtful and personable.
Dr. Emy is caring and clear. Wonderful doctor.
Dr Emy is a kind, thorough internist who takes the time to discuss his patients’ health and lives in detail.
he is the only doctor i have ever truly and wholeheartedly liked and trusted.

reviewDetails.comment: Excellent
She was very thorough
Dr. Choe is very professional, to the point and well prepared; I felt  that she throughly reviewed my file before my visit and the visit was efficient. I felt well cared for, I am in good hands.
She has been my doctor for many years.  She always address my concerns and take time to put me on ease.
She is great - straight forward and helpful!

reviewDetails.comment: He’s great!!!!
Wonderful, caring doctor. My family has gone to him for several  years
Dr. Rubin and his Staff are very professional. They take time to explain the procedures they are performing so you know what to expect.
Longer wait time and no relief from medication prescribed by him. Had to ultimately see another eye doctor as my eye condition got worsened after using medication prescribed by him.
Dr Rubin is very thorough , he does not rush and explains everything during your visit.

Dr, Rubin is professional and easy going - he made my visits pleasant despite the quite painful corneal abrasion that led me to him.  Would recommend him to anyone who is having eye issues!  The staff is courteous and helpful as well.
Finally diagnosed my eye condition and prescribed appropriate medication.  Very nice doctor.

participatingProducts.description: Open Access Plus, OA Plus, ChoiceFund OA Plus
Open Access Plus, OA Plus, ChoiceFund OA Plus with CareLink

reviewDetails.comment: I’ve been going to Dr. Greenberg for years now.  He gives a thorough exam every time and answers any questions I have.

Nothing much to tell . He advised me nothing was wrong & didn't really check my eyes ... other then reading an  eye chart ..as if I were there for glasses , however I was not .. very disappointed sums it up . I resorted back to my optometrist, for an ongoing issue that Dr Greenberg did not detect ..
Office staff friendly and helpful. Dr. Was thorough and answered all my questions.
Very thorough examination n also explained questions very well

reviewDetails.comment: Dr. Barzideh is excellent! Very knowledgeable & thorough. Highly recommend.
Very pleasant and knowledgable.. She made me feel comfortable and she took the time to explain each test and followed with my PCP while i was there. Also referred me to a specialist .
Fabulous doctor, thorough, wonderful person.

reviewDetails.comment: Most knowledgeable and personable Eye doctor I could wish for. Extremely courteous and friendly, consistently makes patients feel at ease and comfortable. He is very thorough and attentive in his work. Always explains every step in the process, as well as results in a way which anyone can understand.  No billing surprises! - staff always checks and explains all the possible costs in advance.
Excellent  doctor.
